description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Plays some music and makes smoky effects on the screen.  The behavior of the imagery can be affected by the xbox360 controller.  Play with the effects, or turn it on in the background of your next neighborhood rave!  Now featuring full 1080p support!  Press Start to access the menu.
